name: aku-aku-mask-from-crash-bandicoot-in-css-pick-an-emotion-
title: Aku-Aku mask from Crash Bandicoot in CSS (pick-an-emotion!)
description:
On my never-ending quest of things to remake in CSS, I couldn't not take a stab at Aku-Aku, the friendly mask from the Crash Bandicoot franchise. I used clip-path which can be seen as "cheating", closer to SVG that pure CSS shapes, but it's still CSS, right?

Inspired by the beautiful work by Elio Qoshi: https://dribbble.com/shots/4127881-Aku-Aku-Emotions
